CHAT.comment: EDWARD JEROME HARBISON, Petitioner v. RICKY BELL, WARDEN.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 1:00 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DANA C. HANSEN CHAVIS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM M. JAY ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, IN SUPPORT OF THE JUDGMENT BELOW
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DANA C. HANSEN CHAVIS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 2:00 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
